entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
